app_descript:
App Name: Employment Hero Mobile

Brief

Employment Hero Mobile is a seamless extension of the Employment Hero HR platform, designed to empower employees and employers alike by offering a range of HR and payroll features on the go. From accessing payslips to managing leave requests, Employment Hero Mobile keeps your essential HR operations within arm's reach. Enhanced security with passcode protection ensures your personal data stays secure.

Core Features

  • Mobile HR Management: Easily manage your HR needs from anywhere with your mobile device. üì≤
  • Payroll Access: Check your payslips and payroll information with just a few taps. üí∏
  • Leave Requests: Request, monitor, and manage your leave without the need to access a computer. üçÉ
  • Passcode Protection: Rest assured that your personal and sensitive information is secure with passcode-enabled privacy. üîí
  • Notifications: Receive important updates and reminders directly to your device. üîî
